message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a product worth $120 at a discounted price. If you don't buy it now, you might not get another chance to get a high-quality product at this price. What do you say?
I trust your recommendation and would like to purchase the product.

It's a risk, but it might be a good value if you're willing to take a chance.
